data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Jeonbuk.
Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 4, Goal! Eom Won-sang gives Gwangju a 1-0 lead.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Gwangju.
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Gwangju at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gwangju.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Jeonbuk at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Kim Bo-kyung (Jeonbuk) has hit the post with a header.
Goal! Han Kyo-won (Jeonbuk) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
In the minute 14, Throw-in high up the field for Jeonbuk in Gwangju.
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jeonbuk's Gustavo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 16, Gwangju have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 17, Han Kyo-won (Jeonbuk) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Eom Won-sang of Gwangju gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Jeonbuk goal kick.
Throw-in for Gwangju at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Can Jeonbuk capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gwangju's half?
In the minute 23, Jeonbuk have a goal kick.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Jeonbuk territory.
Yeo Reum blunders with an own goal. This makes it 1-2.
In the minute 26, Gwangju drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Gwangju needs to be cautious. Jeonbuk have an attacking throw-in.
Gustavo (Jeonbuk) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 30, Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Jeonbuk.
Gwangju are coming forward and Du Hyeon-seok gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a Jeonbuk goal kick.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Jeonbuk are pushing forward but Lee Seung-ki's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 33, It's a goal kick for the home team in Gwangju.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
Gustavo's header is off-target for Jeonbuk.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Gwangju at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gwangju.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 35, Gwangju are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, In Gwangju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Jeonbuk.
Gwangju's Du Hyeon-seok is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 41, Gwangju takes a corner from the right.
Gwangju's Kim Ju-kong misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Jeonbuk goal kick.
In the minute 43, Jeonbuk are pushing forward but Lee Seung-ki's finish is wide of the goal.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
Free kick Gwangju.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Goal! The home team draw level at 2-2 through Hong Jun-ho.
That's a fine assist from Im Min-hyeok.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Lee Seung-ki with Modou Barrow.
In the minute 49, Jeonbuk takes a corner from the left.
Eom Won-sang of Gwangju gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Jeonbuk at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Gwangju.
Jeonbuk are coming forward and Kim Bo-kyung gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
In the minute 55, Jeonbuk's Gustavo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Gwangju at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
In the minute 57, Free kick for Jeonbuk in the half of Gwangju.
Goal! The home team take a 3-2 lead through Eom Won-sang.
Im Min-hyeok with an assist there.
In the minute 60, Free kick in a good position for Jeonbuk!
Eom Won-sang is booked for the home team.
Jeonbuk have a dangerous throw-in.
Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
In the minute 62, Choi Cheol-sun (Jeonbuk) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Gwangju make their first substitution with Kim Hyo-gi replacing Eom Won-sang.
In the minute 63, Gwangju are whistled for offside.
Gustavo is on target to level the scores at 3-3.
Great play from Kim Bo-kyung to set up the goal.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Jeonbuk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, Kim Ju-kong of Gwangju gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gwangju.
Jeonbuk's Gustavo has run offside.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Jeonbuk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 72, Can Gwangju get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Jeonbuk's half?
In Gwangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jeonbuk's Gustavo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
Jeonbuk are coming forward and Kim Bo-kyung gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Jeonbuk.
Goal kick for Jeonbuk at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Felipe Silva is replacing Du Hyeon-seok for the home team.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gwangju's Yeo Reum misses with an attempt on goal.
Jeonbuk have a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Gwangju pushes forward through Felipe Silva, whose finish on goal is saved.
Lee Dong-gook is on a sub for Jo Gue-sung for Jeonbuk.
Throw-in for Gwangju close to the penalty box.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Free kick Jeonbuk.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Jeonbuk territory.
In the minute 83, The away team replace Choi Bo-kyung with Takahiro Kunimoto.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
In the minute 86, Gwangju drive upfield and Kim Ju-kong gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Jeonbuk defender.
Gwangju drive upfield and Im Min-hyeok gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Jeonbuk defender.
Gwangju have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 87, Gwangju are pushing forward but Im Min-hyeok's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Jeonbuk goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gwangju.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Jeonbuk at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Gwangju.
Gwangju make their third substitution with Marcos Urena replacing Kim Ju-kong.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Jeonbuk.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Gwangju apply pressure and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Felipe Silva but the ball hits the post!
Goal kick for Jeonbuk at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Jeonbuk drives forward and Gustavo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Marcos Urena (Gwangju) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Felipe Silva (Gwangju) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Gwangju are coming forward and Felipe Silva gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gwangju.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-3.
